greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 1 and a(n+1) = if a(n) > 2*n+1 then a(n)-2*n-1 else a(n)+2*n+1.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: a238324_list = scanl1 (\u v -> if u > v then u - v else u + v) [1, 3 ..]
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 07 2015
